BRANCH.COMMENT: check if db1 connection is valid

SEQUENCE.NAME: $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: fail to get a connection, exit w/ successFlag = false

Values.value: Failed to obtain connection from alias %dbAlias1%

BRANCH.COMMENT: check if db2 connection is valid

SEQUENCE.NAME: $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: fail to get a connection, exit w/ successFlag = false

Values.value: Failed to obtain connection from alias %dbAlias2%

MAP.COMMENT: map db1, db2 connection objects to service input
set sucess flag to 'false'. populate error message
